A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just sad to see so much of what I grew up loving about this world thrown away in one film. I’m all for pushing boundaries and telling new stories but I don’t think you have to crap on the ones you’ve already told. I have no clue how they can still say they intend for this to be a cohesive trilogy. Everything that was setup in VII was passed over or torn down in this. The only reason I even rate it this highly is because the visuals were great and there were some really fun moments but overall I left feeling disappointed.
